        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Summoner> getSummonerByName(java.lang.String... championNames)

        Parameters:
        championNames - the names of summoners to lookup
        Returns:
        a Map with keys being the summoner names as a String and values being a Summoner object

      • getRecentGames

        @Deprecated
public RecentGames getRecentGames(java.lang.Long summonerId)
        Deprecated. with the introduction of the MatchHistory and Match APIs, this has been deprecated and will be shut off at some point. Please use the provided MatchHistory and Match APIs which both provided a greater amount of detail.
        Queries for the recent games of the summoner by their ID.
        Parameters:
        summonerId - the ID of the summoner to lookup
        Returns:
        a RecentGames object containing the 10 most recent games of the summoner.

      • getTeamLeagueById

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<League>> getTeamLeagueById(java.lang.String... teamIds)
        Queries for leagues of each team ID provided. A maximum of 10 team IDs can be provided.
        Parameters:
        teamIds - the IDs of the teams to lookup
        Returns:
        a Map containing a List of each League the team is a part of (3v3 and 5v5 leagues). The League object contains a LeagueEntry for each summoner in the respective league.

        Parameters:
        teamIds - the IDs of the teams to lookup
        Returns:
        a Map containing a List of each League the team is a part of (3v3 and 5v5 leagues). The League object only contains a LeagueEntry for the given team IDs.

      • getStaticSummonerSpellList

        public SummonerSpellList getStaticSummonerSpellList()
        Queries the static api for a list of all the summoner spells in the game. Requests to this API will not be counted in your Rate Limit.
        Returns:
        a SummonerSpellList

      • getStaticSummonerSpell

        public SummonerSpell getStaticSummonerSpell(int summonerSpellId)
        Queries the static api for a specific summoner spell in the game by summonerSpellId Requests to this API will not be counted in your Rate Limit.
        Parameters:
        summonerSpellId - id of the summoner spell to query
        Returns:
        a SummonerSpell representing the summoner spell

                                   SummonerSpellQueryParams summonerSpellQueryParams)

        Returns:
